snippet.title: SimCasino - July 2020 Timelapse
snippet.description:
A quick preview timelapse showing the construction of a small casino with a theater, gaming floor, security monitoring system, and a higher-end bar & sports area on the second floor.   Also includes a brief preview of the SimCasino soundtrack from world-renowned composer Jerry Martin!

Wishlist on Steam:  https://store.steampowered.com/app/1158420/SimCasino/

Follow us here & on Twitter for more updates as SimCasino nears release!
